other_gear: +1 studded leather, +1 rapier, masterwork light crossbow with 20 bolts, cloak of resistance +1, thieves' tools, 489 gp
feats: Combat Reflexes, Dodge, Mobility, Spring Attack, Weapon Finesse

sections.body: During Combat The rogue uses Spring Attack and Combat Expertise.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The freelance thief sells his loyalty for gold.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Rogue/Rogues/Freelance Thief/Hal Five-Coins

sections.body: Hal is an arrogant but skilled thief whose nickname comes from his habit of juggling gold coins. Many guilds have a price on his head.
Hal might be found while rigging an accident, stealing, or planting evidence.
Because he's willing to work for anyone, Hal might end up on the same side as the PCs.

sections.name: Hal Five-Coins

special_qualities: rogue talents (bleeding attack +4, fast stealth, stand up), trapfinding +3
name: Freelance Thief
skills: Acrobatics +14, Bluff +9, Climb +12, Diplomacy +9, Disable Device +14, Disguise +9, Knowledge (local) +11, Perception +10, Sense Motive +10, Sleight of Hand +14, Stealth +14
combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of invisibility, tanglefoot bag
